title: Bloomberg Markets: Halen on McDonald's, Chipotle Earnings
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Halen on McDonald's, Chipotle Earnings
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Halen Senior Restaurant Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing McDonald's strong earnings report and Chipotle's profit gains help ease investors norovirus fears.
